name: The Amazing Shockingly Origin of The Hero Harold
name_original: The Amazing Shockingly Origin of The Hero Harold
description:
This is just a silly and short RPG with Harold as MC.

Join Harold on his chore Quest list and defeat terrifying foes, such as dishes and plants. 

Features:

  • Harold, 'cause I had to.
  • Smol Reid and Priscilla. They're so cute~ 
  • Talking cat. The true hero of this game.
  • Household chores we all hate and forget. I mean FUN GAMEPLAY!
